name: Everdark (TRYIN RYAN)
description:
~~~ WARNING:  Contains cartoon violence! ~~~



Story:

Interdimensional aliens from Everdark are invading!

You have been summoned to stop the Lord of Everdark from taking over the universe!


Mechanics:

* Run, walk,  crouch and shoot  your way through 6 hand-crafted levels!
* Enemies, items and objects are procedurally generated so each playthrough is never the same!  (For better or worse!)
* Each weapon has it's advantages/disadvantages.  Strategize accordingly!


Tips:

*  Crouching makes you harder to see.
*  Energy cores explode when shot.   (Great for crowd control, but they can also blow up supplies, and yourself!)
*  Your Health will regenerate up to 50 hit points if you're seriously injured, so take cover and recover!
*  Head shots do more damage!
*  Use your ammo sparingly!  You might not find any when you need it most!


Gameplay Time:

~30 minutes - 1 hour.   Short and sweet.
